name: feralisp
short_description: Multiplatform and Multiprotocol driver for QLogic Host Bus Adapters. Runs on Solaris, NetBSD, FreeBSD and Linux. Support both initiator and target mode. Supports QLogic 1020 SCSI through Qlogic 25XX FC cards.
